roasted mushrooms

Executed 10 12 18 - WIP

Ingredients

  • 2lb mushrooms, washed/trimmed/quartered
  • 1/4c extra virgin olive oil
  • 4-5 sprigs thyme or rosemary
  • 2 tbsp chopped parsley/chives or other fresh herbs

Directions

  1. Preheat oven to 350F and toss mushrooms with olive oil, seasoning with salt and pepper.
  2. Transfer mushrooms to foil-lined baking vessel in an even layer, spreading thyme and rosemary on top of mushrooms. Move to oven for 15 minutes.
  3. Drain liquid into a separate container (great sauce, very flavorful) and reserve.
  4. Return mushrooms to oven for 30 minutes longer, discarding thyme sprigs and toss with parsley/chives/tarragon, serve immediately.
